text: A matmatiamɨn ikiava a gakui. Me dughiar avɨriba senbar an agharimning ikiava, ankavba an suemning gazui. Ezɨ a zurara senɨn kabar suighava dar aghora egha an suemning ikezir ankavbav sogha dar aghoragharɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨma gumazitam gumazir kamɨn suiragh a ikɨva avegham. Me uaghan senbar a ikeghtɨ da an suiraghan kogham. Egh gumazitam gavgavigh a ikeghan kogham.
